markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Constricting Hold](/Feats.aspx?ID=2917) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Eidolon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=386" />
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 70 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Requirements**
Your eidolon has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33).

</column>

---

Your eidolon constricts the creature, dealing bludgeoning damage equal to your eidolon's level plus its Strength modifier, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save against your spell DC.
name: Constricting Hold
requirement: Your eidolon has a creature  grabbed  or  restrained .
requirement_markdown: Your eidolon has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33).
